00045 CNAnalysisEngine::Reg CNAnalysisEngine::reg;
00046 
00047 CNAnalysisEngine * CNAnalysisEngine::FromBase(BaseEngine *engine)
00048 {
00049     if (engine != NULL && engine->getEngineName() == CNAnalysisEngine::EngineName())
00050         return (CNAnalysisEngine *)engine;
00051     return NULL;
00052 }
00053 
00054 /**
00055  * Constructor. Set up the CN Quant methods, and CN reporters we want to use.
00056  */
00057 CNAnalysisEngine::CNAnalysisEngine()
00058 {
00059     m_pEngine = this;
00060 
00061     // Reporters
00062     m_vCNReporters.push_back(new CNReporterCnchp());
00063     m_vCNReporters.push_back(new CNReporterCychp());
00064 
00065     defineOptions();
00066     m_bComponentRun = false;
00067 }
00068 
00069 /**
00070  * Destructor. Destroy the CN Quant methods, and CN reporters.
00071  */
00072 CNAnalysisEngine::~CNAnalysisEngine()
00073 {
00074     clear();
00075 }
00076 
00077 /**
00078  * Release the memory used by the engine.
00079  */
00080 void CNAnalysisEngine::clear()
00081 {
00082     m_vCNAnalysisMethods.deleteAll();
00083     m_vCNReporters.deleteAll();
00084 }

00086 /**
00087  * Define the options used by the engine.
00088  */
00089 void CNAnalysisEngine::defineOptions()
00090 {
00091   defineOptionSection("Input Options");
00092   defOptMult("", "log2ratio-file", PgOpt::STRING_OPT, "Log2Ratio file.", "");
00093 
00094   defineOptionSection("Analysis Options");
00095   defOptMult("a", "analysis", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00096                      "String representing analysis pathway desired.",
00097                      "");
00098   defineOption("", "gc-correction-bin-count", PgOpt::INT_OPT,
00099                      "The number of bins to use for GC content.",
00100                      "25");
00101 
00102   defineOptionSection("Advanced Options");
00103   defineOption("", "xChromosome", PgOpt::INT_OPT, "X Chromosome.", "24");
00104   defineOption("", "yChromosome", PgOpt::INT_OPT, "Y Chromosome.", "25");
00105 
00106   defineOptionSection("Execution Control Options");
00107   defineOption("", "mem-usage", PgOpt::INT_OPT,
00108                     "How many MB of memory to use for this run.",
00109                     "0");
00110 
00111   defineSharedOptions();
00112 }
00113 
00114 /**
00115  * Define options used by this engine, and also the CNWorkflowEngine.
00116  */
00117 void CNAnalysisEngine::defineSharedOptions()
00118 {
00119     m_pEngine->defineOptionSection("Additional CNAnalysisEngine Options");
00120     m_pEngine->defineOption("", "geno-qc-file", PgOpt::STRING_OPT, "The file output from GenoQC.", "");
00121     m_pEngine->defineOption("", "cyto2", PgOpt::BOOL_OPT, "Processing CYTO2 chip.", "false");
00122     m_pEngine->defineOption("", "array-name", PgOpt::STRING_OPT, "Array name or type to use.", "");
00123     m_pEngine->defineOption("", "set-analysis-name", PgOpt::STRING_OPT, "Analysis name to use as prefix for output files.", "");
00124     m_pEngine->defineOption("", "text-output", PgOpt::BOOL_OPT, "Output data in ASCII text format in addition to calvin format.", "false");
00125     for (int iIndex = 0; (iIndex < (int)m_vCNReporters.size()); iIndex++)
00126     {
00127         m_vCNReporters[iIndex]->defineOptions(*m_pEngine);
00128     }
00129 }

00133 /**
00134  * Define options used by this engine, and also the CNWorkflowEngine.
00135  */
00136 void CNAnalysisEngine::defineSharedStates()
00137 {
00138     if(!m_pEngine->isOptDefined("beta-cn-calibrate")) {
00139         m_pEngine->defineOption("", "beta-cn-calibrate", PgOpt::DOUBLE_OPT, "beta-cn-calibrate", "0");
00140         m_pEngine->defineOption("", "beta-X-cn-calibrate", PgOpt::DOUBLE_OPT, "beta-X-cn-calibrate", "0");
00141         m_pEngine->defineOption("", "beta-Y-cn-calibrate", PgOpt::DOUBLE_OPT, "beta-Y-cn-calibrate", "0");
00142         m_pEngine->defineOption("", "alpha-cn-calibrate", PgOpt::DOUBLE_OPT, "alpha-cn-calibrate", "1");
00143         m_pEngine->defineOption("", "alpha-X-cn-calibrate", PgOpt::DOUBLE_OPT, "alpha-X-cn-calibrate", "1");
00144         m_pEngine->defineOption("", "alpha-Y-cn-calibrate", PgOpt::DOUBLE_OPT, "alpha-Y-cn-calibrate", "1");
00145         m_pEngine->defineOption("", "gaussian-smooth-exp", PgOpt::INT_OPT, "gaussian-smooth-exp", "1");
00146         m_pEngine->defineOption("", "cancer", PgOpt::INT_OPT, "The state of cancer processing.", "0");
00147         m_pEngine->defineOption("", "hmmCN_state", PgOpt::STRING_OPT, "Used for calculating CN calibration parameters.", "");
00148         m_pEngine->defineOption("", "hmmCN_mu", PgOpt::STRING_OPT, "Used for calculating CN calibration parameters.", "");
00149     }
00150 }
00151 
00152 // Create all the specified analysis.
00153 void CNAnalysisEngine::createAnalysis()
00154 {
00155     Verbose::out(1, "CNAnalysisEngine::createAnalysis()");
00156     affymetrix_calvin_parameter::ParameterNameValueType param;
00157     std::vector<std::string>& analysis = m_pEngine->getOptVector("analysis");
00158     // Check for trailing "." (usually due to an extra space in the analysis string)
00159     for (int i = 0; i < analysis.size(); i++) {
00160         if (analysis[i][analysis[i].length() - 1] == '.') {
00161             Err::errAbort(std::string("Trailing '.' found in analysis string '") + analysis[i] + "'");
00162         }
00163     }
00164     m_vCNAnalysisMethods.deleteAll();
00165     CNAnalysisMethodFactory amFactory;
00166     for (unsigned int i = 0; i < analysis.size(); i++)
00167     {
00168         CNAnalysisMethod* am = NULL;
00169         if (analysis[i] == "") {throw(Except("Invalid (blank) analysis specification"));}
00170 
00171         am = amFactory.CNAnalysisMethodForString(analysis[i]);
00172         am->setEngine(m_pEngine);
00173         if (am->getName() == "cancer") {m_pEngine->setOpt("cancer", "1");}
00174         m_vCNAnalysisMethods.push_back(am);
00175     }
00176     if (needToCalculateCalibrationParameters()) {
00177         calculateCalibrationParameters();
00178     }
00179     else {
00180         CalibrationParams dAlphaCNCalibrate = retrieveCalibrationParams();
00181         m_pEngine->setOpt("alpha-cn-calibrate",::getDouble(dAlphaCNCalibrate.alphaCNCalibration, 6));
00182         m_pEngine->setOpt("alpha-X-cn-calibrate",::getDouble(dAlphaCNCalibrate.alphaCNCalibration_X, 6));
00183         m_pEngine->setOpt("alpha-Y-cn-calibrate",::getDouble(dAlphaCNCalibrate.alphaCNCalibration_Y, 6));
00184         m_pEngine->setOpt("beta-cn-calibrate",::getDouble(dAlphaCNCalibrate.betaCNCalibration, 6));
00185         m_pEngine->setOpt("beta-X-cn-calibrate",::getDouble(dAlphaCNCalibrate.betaCNCalibration_X, 6));
00186         m_pEngine->setOpt("beta-Y-cn-calibrate",::getDouble(dAlphaCNCalibrate.betaCNCalibration_Y, 6));
00187     }
00188 }
00189 
00190 bool CNAnalysisEngine::needToCalculateCalibrationParameters()
00191 {
00192     std::string calibrateStr = m_pEngine->getOpt("cn-calibrate-parameters");
00193     return calibrateStr == "";
00194 }
00195 
00196 CalibrationParams CNAnalysisEngine::retrieveCalibrationParams()
00197 {
00198     CalibrationParams params;
00199 
00200     // Default values for calibration parameters
00201     params.alphaCNCalibration = 0.564278;
00202     params.alphaCNCalibration_X = 0.619453;
00203     params.alphaCNCalibration_Y = 0.494620;
00204     params.betaCNCalibration = 1.0;
00205     params.betaCNCalibration_X = 1.0;
00206     params.betaCNCalibration_Y = 1.0;
00207 
00208     std::string calibrateStr = m_pEngine->getOpt("cn-calibrate-parameters");
00209     string name;
00210     map<string, string> param;
00211     SelfCreate::fillInNameParam(calibrateStr, name, param);
00212     map<string, string>::iterator iter;
00213 
00214     iter = param.find("alpha-cn-calibrate");
00215     if (iter != param.end())
00216     {
00217         params.alphaCNCalibration = Convert::toDouble(iter->second);
00218     }
00219     iter = param.find("alpha-X-cn-calibrate");
00220     if (iter != param.end())
00221     {
00222         params.alphaCNCalibration_X = Convert::toDouble(iter->second);
00223     }
00224     iter = param.find("alpha-Y-cn-calibrate");
00225     if (iter != param.end())
00226     {
00227         params.alphaCNCalibration_Y = Convert::toDouble(iter->second);
00228     }
00229     iter = param.find("beta-cn-calibrate");
00230     if (iter != param.end())
00231     {
00232         params.betaCNCalibration = Convert::toDouble(iter->second);
00233     }
00234     iter = param.find("beta-X-cn-calibrate");
00235     if (iter != param.end())
00236     {
00237         params.betaCNCalibration_X = Convert::toDouble(iter->second);
00238     }
00239     iter = param.find("beta-Y-cn-calibrate");
00240     if (iter != param.end())
00241     {
00242         params.betaCNCalibration_Y = Convert::toDouble(iter->second);
00243     }
00244     return params;
00245 }
00246 
00247 /**
00248  * @brief Calculate the parameters used to calibrate the log2 ratio to
00249  * the CN, and store the parameters in the engine's state.
00250  *
00251  * This information seems to be recovered by a getOpt call in
00252  * CNReporterCychp::loadChromosomes
00253  *
00254  * This should be moved out of this class.
00255  */
00256 
00257 void CNAnalysisEngine::calculateCalibrationParameters()
00258 {
00259     std::vector<int> vCN;
00260     std::vector<double> vMu;
00261     AffxByteArray ba;
00262     ba.assign(m_pEngine->getOpt("hmmCN_state"));
00263     ba.replace(",", " ");
00264     vCN.resize(ba.parameterCount());
00265     for (int k=0; k<ba.parameterCount(); k++)
00266     {
00267         vCN[k] = ba.getParameter(k+1).parseInt();
00268     }
00269     ba.assign(m_pEngine->getOpt("hmmCN_mu"));
00270     ba.replace(",", " ");
00271     vMu.resize(ba.parameterCount());
00272     for (int k=0; k<ba.parameterCount(); k++)
00273     {
00274         vMu[k] = ba.getParameter(k+1).parseDouble();
00275     }
00276     if (vCN.size() != vMu.size()) {throw(Except("Cannot calculate CN calibration parameters."));}
00277     double dBetaCNCalibrate = log2(2.0);
00278     m_pEngine->setOpt("beta-cn-calibrate",::getDouble(dBetaCNCalibrate, 6));
00279     m_pEngine->setOpt("beta-X-cn-calibrate",::getDouble(dBetaCNCalibrate, 6));
00280     m_pEngine->setOpt("beta-Y-cn-calibrate",::getDouble(dBetaCNCalibrate, 6));
00281     int iCount = 0;
00282 
00283     for (int k=0; (k<(int)vCN.size()); k++)
00284     {
00285         if (vCN[k] > 0) {iCount++;}
00286     }
00287 
00288     double dAlphaCNCalibrate = 1;
00289     if (iCount > 0)
00290     {
00291         AffxMultiDimensionalArray<double> mx(iCount, 2);
00292         int iIndex = 0;
00293         for (int k=0; k<(int)vCN.size(); k++)
00294         {
00295             if (vCN[k] > 0)
00296             {
00297                 mx.set(iIndex, 0, log2((double)vCN[k]) - dBetaCNCalibrate);
00298                 mx.set(iIndex, 1, vMu[k]);
00299                 iIndex++;
00300             }
00301         }
00302         dAlphaCNCalibrate = mx.regress();
00303     }
00304     m_pEngine->setOpt("alpha-cn-calibrate",::getDouble(dAlphaCNCalibrate, 6));
00305     m_pEngine->setOpt("alpha-X-cn-calibrate",::getDouble(dAlphaCNCalibrate, 6));
00306     m_pEngine->setOpt("alpha-Y-cn-calibrate",::getDouble(dAlphaCNCalibrate, 6));
00307 }
00308 
00309 /**
00310  * Check to see if the options sepcified are valid.
00311  */
00312 void CNAnalysisEngine::checkOptionsImp()
00313 {
00314     defineSharedStates();
00315 
00316     if (m_pEngine == this)
00317     {
00318         if (getOpt("set-analysis-name") == "") {setOpt("set-analysis-name", "CN5");}
00319         setOpt("geno-qc-file", getOpt("geno-qc-file"));
00320     }
00321     if (m_pEngine->isOptDefined("log2ratio-file"))
00322     {
00323         std::vector<std::string> vLog2RatioFileNames = m_pEngine->getOptVector("log2ratio-file");
00324         if (vLog2RatioFileNames.size() == 0) {throw(Except("Invalid (missing) log2ratio-file specification"));}
00325         for (unsigned int i = 0; i < vLog2RatioFileNames.size(); i++)
00326         {
00327             if (vLog2RatioFileNames[i] == "") {throw(Except("Invalid (blank) log2ratio-file specification"));}
00328         }
00329     }
00330     std::vector<std::string>& analysis = m_pEngine->getOptVector("analysis");
00331 
00332     if(analysis.size() == 0) {
00333         m_bComponentRun = true;
00334         analysis.push_back("gaussian-smooth");
00335         analysis.push_back("cn-state");
00336         analysis.push_back("cn-gender");
00337         analysis.push_back("cn-segment");
00338         analysis.push_back("loh");
00339         analysis.push_back("loh-segment");
00340         analysis.push_back("cn-neutral-loh");
00341         analysis.push_back("normal-diploid");
00342         analysis.push_back("mosaicism");
00343     //        analysis.push_back("no-call");
00344     }
00345     createAnalysis();
00346     for (int iIndex = 0; (iIndex < (int)m_vCNReporters.size()); iIndex++)
00347     {
00348         m_vCNReporters[iIndex]->checkOptions(*m_pEngine);
00349     }
00350 }
00351 
00352 /**
00353  * Run the engine.
00354  */
00355 void CNAnalysisEngine::runImp()
00356 {
00357     AffxString str;
00358     int i = 0;
00359     int i1 = 0;
00360     int i2 = 0;
00361     double d = 0;
00362     affx::TsvFile tsv;
00363     CNLog2RatioData data;
00364 
00365     data.setEngine(m_pEngine);
00366     std::vector<std::string> vLog2RatioFileNames = m_pEngine->getOptVector("log2ratio-file");
00367     for (int iIndex = 0; (iIndex < (int)vLog2RatioFileNames.size()); iIndex++)
00368     {
00369         AffxString strFileName = vLog2RatioFileNames[iIndex];
00370         if (affx::File5_File::isHdf5file(strFileName))
00371         {
00372             affx::File5_File file5;
00373             file5.open(strFileName, affx::FILE5_OPEN_RO);
00374 
00375             affx::File5_Tsv* tsv5 = file5.openTsv("CNLog2Ratio_Parameters", affx::FILE5_OPEN);
00376             while (tsv5->nextLine() == affx::FILE5_OK)
00377             {
00378                 AffxString str;
00379                 tsv5->get(0, 0, &str);
00380             }
00381             tsv5->close();
00382             delete tsv5;
00383 
00384             tsv5 = file5.openTsv("CNLog2Ratio_Experiments", affx::FILE5_OPEN);
00385             while (tsv5->nextLine() == affx::FILE5_OK)
00386             {
00387                 CNExperiment* pobjExperiment = new CNExperiment();
00388                 tsv5->get(0, 0, &str); pobjExperiment->setExperimentName(str);
00389                 tsv5->get(0, 1, &d); pobjExperiment->setMadDiffCN((float)d);
00390                 tsv5->get(0, 2, &d); pobjExperiment->setIqr((float)d);
00391                 tsv5->get(0, 3, &d); pobjExperiment->setMeanAbsRle((float)d);
00392                 tsv5->get(0, 4, &d); pobjExperiment->setMedianAutosomeMedian((float)d);
00393                 tsv5->get(0, 5, &str); pobjExperiment->setRawIntensityRatioGenderFromString(str);
00394                 tsv5->get(0, 6, &d); pobjExperiment->setGCCorrectionMetric((float)d);
00395                 int iSearchIndex = data.getExperiments()->binarySearch(*pobjExperiment, 0);
00396                 if (iSearchIndex == -1)
00397                 {
00398                     data.getExperiments()->add(pobjExperiment);
00399                     data.getExperiments()->quickSort(0); // ExperimentName
00400                 }
00401             }
00402             tsv5->close();
00403             delete tsv5;
00404             file5.close();
00405         }
00406         else {
00407           tsv.m_optAutoTrim = true;
00408           if (tsv.open(strFileName) != affx::TSV_OK) {
00409             throw(Except("Cannot open file: " + strFileName));
00410           }
00411           int ridx = 0;
00412           std::vector< AffxString > cols;
00413           cols.resize( tsv.getColumnCount(0) );
00414           for ( int i = 0; i < tsv.getColumnCount(0) ; i++ ) {
00415             tsv.bind(0, i, &(cols[i]), affx::TSV_BIND_REQUIRED );
00416           }
00417           while ( tsv.nextLevel(0) == affx::TSV_OK ) {
00418             int cidx = 0;
00419             if ((ridx++ == 0) && (cols[0].startsWith("experiment")) ) {
00420               throw(Except("The input file does not appear to be in the correct format: " + strFileName));
00421             }
00422             CNExperiment* pobjExperiment = new CNExperiment;
00423             pobjExperiment->setExperimentName(cols[cidx++]);
00424             pobjExperiment->setMadDiffCN((float)AffxByteArray(cols[cidx++]).parseDouble());
00425             pobjExperiment->setIqr((float)AffxByteArray(cols[cidx++]).parseDouble());
00426             pobjExperiment->setMeanAbsRle((float)AffxByteArray(cols[cidx++]).parseDouble());
00427             pobjExperiment->setMedianAutosomeMedian((float)AffxByteArray(cols[cidx++]).parseDouble());
00428             AffxString strGender = cols[cidx++];
00429             pobjExperiment->setRawIntensityRatioGenderFromString(strGender);
00430             pobjExperiment->setGCCorrectionMetric((float)AffxByteArray(cols[cidx++]).parseDouble());
00431             int iSearchIndex = data.getExperiments()->binarySearch(*pobjExperiment, 0);
00432             if (iSearchIndex == -1)
00433             {
00434                 data.getExperiments()->add(pobjExperiment);
00435                 data.getExperiments()->quickSort(0); // ExperimentName
00436             }
00437             else {
00438                 delete pobjExperiment;
00439             }
00440             tsv.close();
00441           }
00442         } // file5 vs tab delimited
00443     }
00444     if (m_pEngine->isOptDefined("geno-qc-file"))
00445     {
00446         data.loadQCMetrics(m_pEngine->getOpt("geno-qc-file"));
00447     }
00448     CNProbeSetArray vProbeSets;
00449     vProbeSets.reserve(3000000);
00450     for (int iExperimentIndex = 0; (iExperimentIndex < data.getExperiments()->getCount()); iExperimentIndex++)
00451     {
00452         // For each experiment, load the data into the ProbeSet array and write it out.
00453         CNExperiment* pobjExperiment = data.getExperiments()->getAt(iExperimentIndex);
00454         vProbeSets.deleteAll();
00455         for (int iIndex = 0; (iIndex < (int)vLog2RatioFileNames.size()); iIndex++)
00456         {
00457             AffxString strFileName = vLog2RatioFileNames[iIndex];
00458             if (affx::File5_File::isHdf5file(strFileName))
00459             {
00460                 affx::File5_File file5;
00461                 file5.open(strFileName, affx::FILE5_OPEN_RO);
00462                 affx::File5_Tsv* tsv5 = file5.openTsv("CNLog2Ratio_" + pobjExperiment->getExperimentName(), affx::FILE5_OPEN);
00463                 while (tsv5->nextLine() == affx::FILE5_OK)
00464                 {
00465                     CNProbeSet* pobjProbeSet = new CNProbeSet();
00466                     tsv5->get(0, 0, &str); pobjProbeSet->setProbeSetName(str);
00467                     tsv5->get(0, 1, &i); pobjProbeSet->setChromosome((unsigned char)i);
00468                     tsv5->get(0, 2, &i); pobjProbeSet->setPosition(i);
00469                     tsv5->get(0, 3, &d); pobjProbeSet->setLog2Ratio((float)d);
00470                     tsv5->get(0, 4, &d); pobjProbeSet->setAllelicDifference((float)d);
00471                     tsv5->get(0, 5, &i); pobjProbeSet->setGenotypeCall((char)i);
00472                     tsv5->get(0, 6, &d); pobjProbeSet->setGenotypeConfidence((float)d);
00473                     tsv5->get(0, 7, &i1);
00474                     tsv5->get(0, 8, &i2);
00475                     if ((i1 == 1) || (i2 == 1)) {pobjProbeSet->setPseudoAutosomalRegion(true);}
00476                     vProbeSets.add(pobjProbeSet);
00477                 }
00478                 tsv5->close();
00479                 delete tsv5;
00480                 file5.close();
00481             }
00482             else {
00483               affx::TsvFile tsv;
00484               tsv.m_optAutoTrim = true;
00485               tsv.open(strFileName);
00486               std::string strExperimentName;
00487               tsv.bind(0,"experiment", &strExperimentName, affx::TSV_BIND_REQUIRED);
00488 
00489 
00490               tsv.nextLevel(0);
00491               
00492               if (strExperimentName == pobjExperiment->getExperimentName()) {
00493                 AffxString strCol;
00494                 int iCidx = 0;
00495                 tsv.nextLevel(0);
00496                 tsv.get(0,0,strCol);
00497                 if (!strCol.startsWith("probeset_id")) {throw(Except("The input file does not appear to be in the correct format: " + strFileName));}
00498                 while (tsv.nextLevel(0) == affx::TSV_OK ) {
00499                   iCidx = 0;
00500                   CNProbeSet* pobjProbeSet = new CNProbeSet();
00501                   tsv.get(0,iCidx++, strCol);
00502                   pobjProbeSet->setProbeSetName(strCol);
00503                   tsv.get(0,iCidx++, strCol);
00504                   pobjProbeSet->setChromosome((char)AffxByteArray(strCol).parseInt());
00505                   tsv.get(0,iCidx++, strCol);
00506                   pobjProbeSet->setPosition(AffxByteArray(strCol).parseInt());
00507                   tsv.get(0,iCidx++, strCol);
00508                   pobjProbeSet->setLog2Ratio((float)AffxByteArray(strCol).parseDouble());
00509                   tsv.get(0,iCidx++, strCol);
00510                   pobjProbeSet->setAllelicDifference((float)AffxByteArray(strCol).parseDouble());
00511                   tsv.get(0,iCidx++, strCol);
00512                   pobjProbeSet->setGenotypeCall((char)AffxByteArray(strCol).parseInt());
00513                   tsv.get(0,iCidx++, strCol);
00514                   pobjProbeSet->setGenotypeConfidence((float)AffxByteArray(strCol).parseDouble());
00515                   tsv.get(0,iCidx++, strCol);
00516                   bool bPAR1 = AffxByteArray(strCol).parsebool();
00517                   tsv.get(0,iCidx++, strCol);
00518                   bool bPAR2 = AffxByteArray(strCol).parsebool();
00519                   if ((bPAR1) || (bPAR2))   {
00520                     pobjProbeSet->setPseudoAutosomalRegion(true);
00521                   }
00522                   vProbeSets.add(pobjProbeSet);
00523                 }
00524                 // Look for duplicates.
00525                     vProbeSets.quickSort(0); // ProbeSetName
00526                     for (int iProbeSetIndex = 1; (iProbeSetIndex < vProbeSets.getCount()); iProbeSetIndex++)
00527                     {
00528                         CNProbeSet* pPrev = vProbeSets.getAt(iProbeSetIndex - 1);
00529                         CNProbeSet* pNext = vProbeSets.getAt(iProbeSetIndex);
00530                         if (pPrev->getProbeSetName() == pNext->getProbeSetName())
00531                         {
00532                             if ((pPrev->getChromosome() == pNext->getChromosome()) && (pPrev->getPosition() == pNext->getPosition()))
00533                             {
00534                                 Verbose::out(1, "WARNING: Duplicate ProbeSet found. Removing the one found in file: " + strFileName);
00535                                 vProbeSets.deleteAt(iProbeSetIndex);
00536                                 iProbeSetIndex--;
00537                             }
00538                             else
00539                             {
00540                                 throw(Except("Annotation mismatch for duplicate ProbeSet. Experiment: " + strExperimentName + ", ProbeSet: " + pPrev->getProbeSetName()));
00541                             }
00542                         }
00543                     }
00544                 }
00545                 tsv.clear();
00546             }
00547         }
00548 
00549         vProbeSets.quickSort(1); // Chromosome, Position, ProbeSetName
00550         process(*pobjExperiment, vProbeSets);
00551     }
00552     data.clear();
00553 }
00554 
00555 /**
00556  * Process the experiment. Call the plugged in CN Quant methods and then call the plugged in CN reporters.
00557  * @param CNExperiment& - The experiment being processed.
00558  * @param CNProbeSetArray& - The vector of ProbeSets associated with this experiment.
00559  */
00560 void CNAnalysisEngine::process(CNExperiment& objExperiment, CNProbeSetArray& vProbeSets, CNProbeArray* pvProbes)
00561 {
00562         // Calculations
00563         if (vProbeSets.size() > 0)
00564         {
00565                 for (int iIndex = 0; (iIndex < (int)m_vCNAnalysisMethods.size()); iIndex++)
00566                 {
00567                         if (m_pEngine->getOptInt("cancer") == 1)
00568                         {
00569                                 if (m_vCNAnalysisMethods[iIndex]->getName() == "cancer")
00570                                 {
00571                                         m_vCNAnalysisMethods[iIndex]->setup(objExperiment, vProbeSets, pvProbes);
00572                                         m_vCNAnalysisMethods[iIndex]->run();
00573                                 }
00574                         }
00575                         else
00576                         {
00577                                 if (m_vCNAnalysisMethods[iIndex]->getName() != "cancer")
00578                                 {
00579                                         m_vCNAnalysisMethods[iIndex]->setup(objExperiment, vProbeSets, pvProbes);
00580                                         m_vCNAnalysisMethods[iIndex]->run();
00581                                 }
00582                         }
00583                 }
00584         }
00585         if (m_pEngine->getOptInt("cancer") == 1)
00586         {
00587                 m_pEngine->setOpt("cancer", "2");
00588                 return;
00589         }
00590         postProcessing(objExperiment, vProbeSets);
00591         // Ouput data
00592         for (int iIndex = 0; (iIndex < (int)m_vCNReporters.size()); iIndex++)
00593         {
00594                 m_vCNReporters[iIndex]->setup(*m_pEngine, objExperiment, vProbeSets, m_vCNAnalysisMethods);
00595                 m_vCNReporters[iIndex]->run();
00596         }
00597 }
00598 
00599 /**
00600  * Calculate some sample metrics and store them in the experiment object.
00601  * @param CNExperiment& - The experiment being processed.
00602  * @param CNProbeSetArray& - The vector of ProbeSets associated with this experiment.
00603  */
00604 void CNAnalysisEngine::postProcessing(CNExperiment& objExperiment, CNProbeSetArray& vProbeSets)
00605 {
00606     const bool isCytoScanHD = m_pEngine->getOptBool("cytoscan-hd");
00607         float fConfidenceThreshold = CNAnalysisMethod::getConfidenceThreshold(m_pEngine->getOpt("brlmmp-parameters"));
00608     int iSnpTotalCount = 0;
00609     int iHomTotalCount = 0;
00610     int iHetTotalCount = 0;
00611     for (int iIndex = 0; (iIndex < (int)vProbeSets.size()); iIndex++)
00612     {
00613         CNProbeSet* pobjProbeSet = vProbeSets.at(iIndex);
00614         if (pobjProbeSet->processAsSNP())
00615         {
00616                         if (isCytoScanHD && (pobjProbeSet->getGenotypeConfidence() >= fConfidenceThreshold)) {continue;}
00617             if ((pobjProbeSet->getGenotypeCall() == 0) || (pobjProbeSet->getGenotypeCall() == 2))
00618             {
00619                 iHomTotalCount++;
00620             }
00621             if (pobjProbeSet->getGenotypeCall() == 1)
00622             {
00623                 iHetTotalCount++;
00624             }
00625             iSnpTotalCount++;
00626         }
00627     }
00628     AffxMultiDimensionalArray<float> vCnState((int)vProbeSets.size());
00629     for (int iIndex = 0; (iIndex < (int)vProbeSets.size()); iIndex++)
00630     {
00631         CNProbeSet* pobjProbeSet = vProbeSets.at(iIndex);
00632         int iXChromosome = m_pEngine->getOptInt("xChromosome");
00633         int iYChromosome = m_pEngine->getOptInt("yChromosome");
00634         float fCalibratedLog2Ratio = 0.0;
00635         if (pobjProbeSet->getChromosome() < iXChromosome) {
00636             fCalibratedLog2Ratio = pobjProbeSet->getCalibratedLog2Ratio(m_pEngine->getOptDouble("alpha-cn-calibrate"), m_pEngine->getOptDouble("beta-cn-calibrate"));
00637         }
00638         else if (pobjProbeSet->getChromosome() == iXChromosome) {
00639             fCalibratedLog2Ratio = pobjProbeSet->getCalibratedLog2Ratio(m_pEngine->getOptDouble("alpha-X-cn-calibrate"), m_pEngine->getOptDouble("beta-X-cn-calibrate"));
00640         }
00641         else if (pobjProbeSet->getChromosome() == iYChromosome) {
00642             fCalibratedLog2Ratio = pobjProbeSet->getCalibratedLog2Ratio(m_pEngine->getOptDouble("alpha-Y-cn-calibrate"), m_pEngine->getOptDouble("beta-Y-cn-calibrate"));
00643         }
00644         vCnState.set(iIndex, fCalibratedLog2Ratio);
00645     }
00646     objExperiment.setMedianCnState(vCnState.median());
00647     objExperiment.setHomFrequency((double)iHomTotalCount / (double)iSnpTotalCount);
00648     objExperiment.setHetFrequency((double)iHetTotalCount / (double)iSnpTotalCount);
00649 
00650     // Calculate SNPQC and RawSNPQC
00651     if (objExperiment.isSNPQCset()) {return;}
00652     if (!m_pEngine->isOptDefined("snp-qc-use-contrast")) {return;}
00653     if (!m_pEngine->isOptDefined("snp-qc-k")) {return;}
00654     if (!m_pEngine->isOptDefined("snp-qc-em-threshold")) {return;}
00655     if (!m_pEngine->isOptDefined("snp-qc-bin-size")) {return;}
00656     AffxArray<AffxString> arSNPIds;
00657     if ((m_pEngine->isOptDefined("snp-qc-snp-list")) && (m_pEngine->getOpt("snp-qc-snp-list") != ""))
00658     {
00659       affx::TsvFile tsv;
00660       tsv.m_optAutoTrim = true;
00661       tsv.openTable(m_pEngine->getOpt("snp-qc-snp-list"));
00662       std::string strSnp;
00663       while (tsv.nextLevel(0) == affx::TSV_OK) {
00664         tsv.get(0,0,strSnp);
00665         arSNPIds.add(new AffxString(strSnp));
00666       }
00667       tsv.close();
00668 
00669     }
00670     arSNPIds.quickSort(0);
00671 
00672     const double log2 = log(2.0);
00673 
00674     std::vector<double> vData;
00675     if (m_pEngine->getOptBool("cyto2")) {
00676         if (m_pEngine->getOptBool("snp-qc-use-contrast")) {
00677             if (arSNPIds.empty()) {
00678                 for (int iIndex = 0; iIndex < vProbeSets.getCount(); iIndex++) {
00679                     CNProbeSet* pobjProbeSet = vProbeSets.at(iIndex);
00680                     if (!pobjProbeSet->processAsVisualization()) {
00681                         continue;
00682                     }
00683                     vData.push_back(pobjProbeSet->getIntensityContrast(m_pEngine->getOptDouble("snp-qc-k")));
00684                 }
00685             } else {
00686                 for (int iIndex = 0; iIndex < vProbeSets.getCount(); iIndex++) {
00687                     CNProbeSet* pobjProbeSet = vProbeSets.at(iIndex);
00688                     if (!pobjProbeSet->processAsVisualization()) {
00689                         continue;
00690                     }
00691                     AffxString str = pobjProbeSet->getProbeSetName();
00692                     if (arSNPIds.binarySearch(str, 0) != -1)
00693                     {
00694                         vData.push_back(pobjProbeSet->getIntensityContrast(m_pEngine->getOptDouble("snp-qc-k")));
00695                     }
00696                 }
00697             }
00698         } else {
00699             if (arSNPIds.empty()) {
00700                 for (int iIndex = 0; iIndex < vProbeSets.getCount(); iIndex++) {
00701                     CNProbeSet* pobjProbeSet = vProbeSets.at(iIndex);
00702                     if (pobjProbeSet->getInformation()==0.0) {
00703                         continue;
00704                     }
00705                     if (!pobjProbeSet->processAsVisualization()) {
00706                         continue;
00707                     }
00708                     vData.push_back(pobjProbeSet->getSCAR());
00709                 }
00710             } else {
00711                 for (int iIndex = 0; iIndex < vProbeSets.getCount(); iIndex++) {
00712                     CNProbeSet* pobjProbeSet = vProbeSets.at(iIndex);
00713                     if (pobjProbeSet->getInformation()==0.0) {
00714                         continue;
00715                     }
00716                     if (!pobjProbeSet->processAsVisualization()) {
00717                         continue;
00718                     }
00719                     AffxString str = pobjProbeSet->getProbeSetName();
00720                     if (arSNPIds.binarySearch(str, 0) != -1)
00721                     {
00722                         vData.push_back(pobjProbeSet->getSCAR());
00723                     }
00724                 }
00725             }
00726         }
00727     } else {
00728         // Make a copy of pointers to probe sets sorted by name
00729         CNProbeSetArray resortedProbeSets = vProbeSets;
00730         resortedProbeSets.quickSort(0);
00731 
00732         AffxString strReferenceFileName = m_pEngine->getOpt("reference-file");
00733         affx::File5_File file5;
00734         affx::File5_Group* group5 = NULL;
00735         affx::File5_Tsv* tsv5 = NULL;
00736 
00737         file5.open(strReferenceFileName, affx::FILE5_OPEN_RO);
00738         group5 = file5.openGroup("CN5", affx::FILE5_OPEN);
00739         tsv5 = group5->openTsv("CN5.snp-posteriors", affx::FILE5_OPEN);
00740 
00741         while (tsv5->nextLine() == affx::FILE5_OK) {
00742             string probeSetName;
00743             double clusterAAmean;
00744             double clusterABmean;
00745             double clusterBBmean;
00746 
00747             tsv5->get(0, 0, &probeSetName);
00748             tsv5->get(0, 2, &clusterAAmean);
00749             tsv5->get(0, 6, &clusterABmean);
00750             tsv5->get(0, 10, &clusterBBmean);
00751 
00752             if (!arSNPIds.empty()) {
00753                 AffxString str(probeSetName);
00754                 if (arSNPIds.binarySearch(str, 0) == -1) {
00755                     continue;
00756                 }
00757             }
00758             CNProbeSet searchProbeSet;
00759             searchProbeSet.setProbeSetName(probeSetName);
00760             pair<CNProbeSetArray::iterator, CNProbeSetArray::iterator> range = equal_range(
00761                                                                                     resortedProbeSets.begin(),
00762                                                                                     resortedProbeSets.end(),
00763                                                                                     &searchProbeSet,
00764                                                                                     ProbeSetNameCompare()
00765                                                                                     );
00766             if (range.first == range.second) {
00767                 continue;
00768             }
00769 
00770             CNProbeSet* foundProbeSet = *range.first;
00771             if (foundProbeSet->processAsVisualization())
00772             {
00773                 double log2ratio = log(foundProbeSet->getAAlleleSignal()/foundProbeSet->getBAlleleSignal())/log2;
00774                 double scaledLog2Ratio = log2ratio - clusterABmean;
00775                 scaledLog2Ratio /= 0.5*(abs(clusterAAmean - clusterABmean) + abs(clusterBBmean - clusterABmean));
00776                 vData.push_back(scaledLog2Ratio);
00777             }
00778         }
00779         tsv5->close();
00780         delete tsv5;
00781 
00782         group5->close();
00783         delete group5;
00784         file5.close();
00785     }
00786     arSNPIds.deleteAll();
00787 
00788     for (int i = 0; (i < vData.size()); i++)
00789     {
00790         if (vData[i] != vData[i])
00791         {
00792             vData[i] = 0;
00793         }
00794     }
00795 
00796     if (m_pEngine->getOptBool("cyto2")) {
00797         objExperiment.setSNPQC(HomHiLoCelListener::computeStatistic(vData, m_pEngine->getOptDouble("snp-qc-em-threshold"), m_pEngine->getOptDouble("snp-qc-bin-size")));
00798     } else {
00799         objExperiment.setSNPQC(HomHiLoCelListener::computeSNPQC(vData));
00800     }
00801     objExperiment.setIsSNPQCset(true);
00802 
00803     Verbose::out(1, "*");
00804     Verbose::out(1, "CNQC  (MAPD) = " + ToStr(objExperiment.getMadDiffCN()));
00805     if (m_pEngine->getOptBool("cyto2")) {
00806         if (m_pEngine->getOptBool("snp-qc-use-contrast"))
00807         {
00808             Verbose::out(1, "SNPQC (Contrast) = " + ToStr(objExperiment.getSNPQC()));
00809         }
00810         else 
00811         {
00812             Verbose::out(1, "SNPQC (PVQC) = " + ToStr(objExperiment.getSNPQC()));
00813         }
00814     } else {
00815         Verbose::out(1, "SNPQC (EMQC) = " + ToStr(objExperiment.getSNPQC()));
00816         Verbose::out(1, "RawSNPQC = " + ToStr(objExperiment.getRawSNPQC()));
00817     }
00818     Verbose::out(1, "*");
00819 }
Generated on Wed Mar 23 2016 12:58:55 for Affymetrix Power Tools by  1.7.1
